comment.author: 30515687@N05
comment._content: bobm identified this photo over at the Baseball Think Factory bulletin boards: Posted: December 12, 2009 at 04:05 PM (#3410920) This picture is from June 1922. The Yankees played 3 in-season exhibition games during the 1920s in Rochester, NY. July 6, 1921 4-2 Loss to the Rochester Colts of the IL June 5, 1922 4-3 Loss to the Rochester Tribe of the IL June 4, 1926 7-2 Win over the Rochester Tribe of the IL From the June 1922 issue of Kodak Magazine (from the photographic film company headquartered in Rochester, NY): "You were no doubt very much aware of the fact that June 5 — 10 was 'Milk Week' in Rochester."
